text: Rhea Jo Perlman (born March 31, 1968) is an American television, movie actress, and writer. She is best known for her role as Carla Tortelli in Cheers. She was born in Brooklyn, New York City.Rhea Perlman Biography (1948â€“) at filmreference.com Perlman is married to actor Danny DeVito. They have three children together. Perlman has won four Emmy Awards. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Brooklyn Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Writers from New York City
